title: Learn Past Simple for Completed Actions
objectives: Understand Past Simple at Beginner level
Apply Past Simple in real conversations

vocabulary.definition: looked at something for a period
vocabulary.example: She watched a movie last night.

vocabulary.definition: engaged in a game or sport

vocabulary.example: He travelled to California last summer.

content.introduction: Past Simple describes actions completed at a specific time in the past. It is formed by adding -ed for regular verbs.
content.explanation: Regular verbs add -ed; irregular verbs change forms (go â†’ went). Use time expressions like yesterday, last week, ago. This tense is used for stories and past experiences.
examples: I visited New York last year.
tips: Learn irregular past forms by heart.
Use specific past time expressions for clarity.

exercises.question: Which sentence is in Past Simple?
Tell about a memorable event from last year.

culturalNote: Past Simple is used frequently in American storytelling to share experiences and past events.
